heading: HR01694
0: A RESOLUTION DIRECTING THE APPROPRIATE COMMITTEE/S TO CONDUCT AN INVESTIGATION INTO THE CASE OF JOANNA DEMAFELIS, WHO WAS KILLED BY HER SYRIAN AND LEBANESE EMPLOYERS A YEAR AGO AND WHOSE BODY WAS FOUND INSIDE A FREEZER IN AN ABANDONED APARTMENT IN KUWAIT ONLY RECENTLY, AND OTHER ABUSES AGAINST OVERSEAS FILIPINO WORKERS (OFWs) IN THE MIDDLE EAST THAT SOMETIMES END IN DEATHS AND TO RECOMMEND APPROPRIATE LEGISLATION
status: Pending with the Committee on OVERSEAS WORKERS AFFAIRS since 2018-02-28
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR01694
FULL TITLE : A RESOLUTION DIRECTING THE APPROPRIATE COMMITTEE/S TO CONDUCT AN INVESTIGATION INTO THE CASE OF JOANNA DEMAFELIS, WHO WAS KILLED BY HER SYRIAN AND LEBANESE EMPLOYERS A YEAR AGO AND WHOSE BODY WAS FOUND INSIDE A FREEZER IN AN ABANDONED APARTMENT IN KUWAIT ONLY RECENTLY, AND OTHER ABUSES AGAINST OVERSEAS FILIPINO WORKERS (OFWs) IN THE MIDDLE EAST THAT SOMETIMES END IN DEATHS AND TO RECOMMEND APPROPRIATE LEGISLATION
